name: Project Deadzone
description:
A shooter where your crosshairs can have different patterns / behavior. This is the beginnings of a shooter that we plan to release in 2025.

Join me in creating something different in the FPS genre! 

All animations are placeholders until we hit pre-production. Sounds used are from Modern Warfare 2019 while we are in prototyping phase.

Any feedback / suggestions greatly appreciated! This is constantly changing and nothing is final. 

Thank you for your time and feedback!
